html:
11.12.18  11:28 pm   if given the opportunity, would you be president?

     no

      No campaigning required

     yes, and no sleep allowed. there is a steady 24 hour stream of problems flowing directly to your door, as president

11.12.18  11:23 pm   What do you do when the even but there never was and always can be, forever ?

     carry on about my day

11.12.18  11:22 pm   would you say you're a musical internet magician, or a magical internet musician?- asking for a friend.
also- thabk you.

     that's very nice of you but it depends which hemisphere you are in . one of the very confusing and yet strangely enjoyable things about living in a round world

11.12.18  10:34 pm   I have a song I want to write, but I worked on it for a couple of hours and ended up with nothing because I knew just enough about what I wanted it to be that I could tell everything I tried wasn't it. What do I do now?

     ah, this is one of the weird strange quirks of the material world. it seems obnoxiously annoying at first but then you realize that everything you ever dreamed of can be made simply by doing one thing at a time and as a reward for coping with how terrible each one is, you realize that not only is it fun to make terrible things but they will also start gradually getting closer to everything you ever wanted them to be. it is also a warm feeling to know that everyone who has ever created anything in the world you live in has also gone through this exact same path and procedure

11.12.18  10:25 pm   Do you dream much? If yes, what about?

     recenty i dreamt i was at a bob marley concert and he was playing one of the classics. this was convenient for me because i woke up realizing that the song never existed before, so it's mine now

11.12.18  10:23 pm   How can I become a good teacher? 

     just start teaching people, 1 at a time. or more, if you are feeling frisky

11.12.18  9:25 pm   If you had to give a name to the genre of music which, not necessarily you fit into, but that people who emulated and  closely resembled your style fit into, what would you call it? Wurtz-likes? Wurtzisms? Sgt. Wurtz' Lonely Hearts Club Band?

     if it's based on a person, usually just the name of that person should be fine

11.12.18  8:40 pm   my friend likes me and i think they're trying to pull me away from a love instrest of mine; how do i deal with it

     oh no, that reminds me of someone else on this page who said they are interested in one of their friends and want to know how to pull them away from their love interest

11.12.18  8:17 pm   You don't seem to have answered any questions in the last 24 hours. Are you dead?

     no, good guess, but i was making a music video

11.12.18  7:49 pm   Do you ever think about having mainstream success with one of your music,

     always

      like having one of your songs 'on the charts'?

     all of them, if possible

      Would you ever write a song with the specific intention of trying to make a pop song

     every time

      or do you think it's best to stay true to yourself and make your music how you like it?

     every time

      Sorry if that came off sounding rude, I know you've already had a lot of success with your stuff and have lots of devoted fans. I've probably listened to your music more than any other artist in the past year or so.. but I'd like to see you selling out madison square garden and hearing your songs whenever I turn on the radio, etc. I think there's a lot of pop artists who actively try to make 'pop music'.. which isn't to say that pop can't still be unique or great or whatever, but I think there's more to writing pop than just making what you like. I think a lot of these artists are really good at looking at trends in music and knowing how to appeal to a wide audi ence and all that stuff.

     trends don't grow on trees... someone has to make the trends!

11.12.18  7:16 pm   I have a song, who has "G# A B C D E F" for the main melody line. She doesnt have an F# so the key not a melodic A minor, but she has G# instead of G so it's not an A natural minor either... WHAT IS HER KEY H E L P M E!!!!! also she has Am Fmaj Gmaj and Emaj for the main chord progression which looks like complete bullshit when i try to search for keys online IM COMPLETELY LOST IS MY SONG WRONG SHE SOUNDS RIGHT
 

     without telling me the order or rhythm the notes go in, this still feels like a quiz, ..... but given the info i know i would say A minor is likely

11.12.18  6:54 pm   You're getting late with these questions, Bill, I used to be able to wake up to a fresh batch, but now it's getting closer and closer to night before you update the page. what's going on at the moment?

     that's the normal pattern

11.12.18  5:31 pm   How do I make myself do something I don't want to do, but I really have to do?

     if you have to do it then you will. if you don't then i guess you didn't have to

11.12.18  5:17 pm   How do you make your music 

     it makes me

11.12.18  5:04 pm   Do you are have stupid?

     i have that skill set

11.12.18  3:25 pm   What do you think of the word "slat"? I dunno but I think it sounds weird.

     it has a very dignified quality to it, bestowing a certain dignity upon whoever says it

11.12.18  2:22 pm   what do you think of censorship

     i don't think i am allowed to say

11.12.18  1:18 pm   Are you afraid of capital letters,

     no

      why?

11.12.18  12:56 pm   i know you've said before that you hate merch because it's like saving one kid out of multiple from a pile of lava and then reminiscing on it instead of rescuing more kids but have you ever considered making t-shirt designs that have nothing to do with your previous content? a lot of the most interesting band shirts i've seen are completely original designs exclusive to the t-shirt.

     that's true, it would be fun to make clothing but also fun to make buildings, food, and tractors. many more things. i have a long list, .... i hope to eventually make everything

11.12.18  11:48 am   how many zebras can you

     all of them

11.12.18  11:25 am   should kirby stop going to space

     maybe stay there

11.12.18  9:22 am   HELP I AM TRAPPED IN THE ETERNAL HELL THAT IS Bb PLEASE PUT MY PHOTO ON MILK CARTONS SO ONE DAY I CAN HOME TO A NICE F KEY OR SOMETHING HELP

     F is a little close to Bb, i think if you want to get away try E or something

11.12.18  8:39 am   I want to pursue music and more than one person has told me to move from our relatively small town to a big city. Thoughts?

     that could be good for your general attitude, if that's what you want. but if you don't want to do that, nowadays you might turn out fine as long as you can get wily on the internet

11.12.18  8:32 am   bill when will you go on tour

     as soon as possible

11.12.18  8:08 am   when I was taking literature courses in college, my professors always cautioned against presuming that the speaker of the piece was synonymous with the artist. do you feel like the people in your songs are yourself or do you feel like they're other people? if I wanted to refer to the person in the song long long long story, could I call them Al?

     i think it's you

11.12.18  7:39 am   Are you still going to make those short videos like "i'm a loser" and "bench"?

     yes

11.12.18  7:00 am   What do I need to sacrifice and who do I need to sacrifice it to to become you?

     there is a secret twist, you can become so good yourself that others will ask what to sacrifice to become you

11.12.18  4:28 am   bill, can you make an anagram out of this question?

     yes but i won't do it on this page. that's why i made a special page just for that, to resist temptation to stall the entire questions process

11.12.18  4:26 am   What is the best piece of music you know?

     oh i'm not falling for that one again. each time i choose one, another one becomes better. that's just how music works. actually that's how the entire world works

11.12.18  3:43 am   what are some cool websites you've been blown away by their design/aproach ?

     craig's list

11.12.18  3:34 am   what would you do if you:
1. made a mistake and could fix it
2. made a mistake and couldn't fix it
3. made a mistake and thought you could fix it but ended up making another mistake in the process 

     start becoming a mistakes expert

11.12.18  2:37 am   why are supermarkets selling Christmas things at the moment? don't they know Christmas was 11 months ago?

     it is back, stronger

11.12.18  2:23 am   Here's the situation. I have a finite amount of time to release quite a bit of content. I know what the content is going to be and am now in the process of making the content and then making it good. But my issue is that I keep getting stuck on this first video. I've made and finished the 10 videos after the first one and now I've made the first one 10 different times and I'm still not happy with it. The dilemma is this: Do I keep trying to make it better or suck it up and release the bad stuff? Or is there a third option... maybe a fourth, too.

     if it's true what you said, you have a finite amount of time. so as you approach the end of that time, you won't be stuck

11.12.18  1:48 am   How to play wind instruments with a quality sound while having braces?

     i have no idea

11.12.18  12:56 am   have you attempted to get your songs to play on the radio?

     yes

      if so, how successful were your attempts?

     still doing the attempt

11.12.18  12:45 am   How do you feel about Eb9sus4

     it seems to imply the key of Ab

11.12.18  12:03 am   do you copy paste vocal lines sometimes? for instance in Outside the line 'i wanna go' sounds really similar each time.

     i hope to never never ever do that. if i ever did it i am sorry, to you and to myself also

11.11.18  11:07 pm   What are some of your favorite ingredients to put in a sandwich? I'm all out of ideas.

     beans

11.11.18  10:53 pm   What stuff are you supposed to practice when you want to get advanced lvl in musicland? 

     connecting with the audience

11.11.18  10:32 pm   Do you use colour as a drug? 

     i never thought about it that way but yes i do

11.11.18  10:07 pm   What are some artist/musicians you like listening to? I've been listening to some Frank Sinatra recently.

      some great horn solis on those songs

11.11.18  10:00 pm   How to make sure im not in a coma

      see if you can tap dance. if you can, you still might be in a coma but it doesn't matter

11.11.18  8:44 pm   How often do you dabble in odd time signatures (e.g. 5/8 or 15/16)

     whenever necessary

      and could you make a song that uses an odd time signature or few?

     sure. i've done it quite a bit. it's kind of like the sand wedge. it's useful to use sometimes, and you might use it at least a few times per week. maybe not in every game unless someone dares you to

11.11.18  8:28 pm   how do I stop thinking bad and start focusing on the things that actually matter

     which things matter

11.11.18  8:24 pm   why do you want to create content

     to prove i was here

11.11.18  8:08 pm   Is the giftshop still there on Mount St. Helens?

     i'm not sure if it was ever there. i made it up, without checking to see if it really exists

11.11.18  7:21 pm   What inspires your lyrics ?

     anything

11.11.18  6:30 pm   I noticed that you have a lot of "characters" your videos. Like, there's Steve. Then there's Damien Maymdien, Triangle Boy...And plenty of others. Who is your favorite one, and which one do you relate to the most?

     the one from 'when i get older', and 'la de da'

11.11.18  5:55 pm   Hey Bill, can I go home when everything ends?

     you can go home any time but something else is going to start anyway

11.11.18  5:30 pm   i tested my pitch and i got a 97%, what is this ca lled? 97% perfect pitch?

     'perfect pitch' usually means 'absolute pitch' which means without any relative reference, so that means in this test the only one that really counts is the 1st one. and even that doesn't count if you heard any notes any time recently
